Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 25th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/24/2015, off Fernando Cantu (BRO)...
Earned first career win on 4/24/2015...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2016, going 5-0, 1.44...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2017, going 4-0, 1.04...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/5/2018 to a 5-year deal worth $21,000,002 per year...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/10/2018 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2018, going 3-0, 0.81...
Injured on 5/6/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/2021, going 6-0, 1.27...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/2021, going 5-0, 2.00...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/2022, winning 2 games with a 0.64 ERA...
